text: Joshua Cooley (born May 23, 1980) is an American animator, screenwriter, director and voice actor. He is best known for working on the 2015 Pixar animated movie Inside Out and directing the short movie Riley's First Date?. He directed Toy Story 4. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American animators Category:American voice actors Category:Movie directors from California Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Actors from Berkeley, California Category:Writers from Berkeley, California
title: Josh Cooley
